title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, April 12, 2021
description: Today we remember Beverly Cleary on what would have been her 105th birthday. She died just 18 days ago. Her legacy, bringing children books about regular kids, just like them.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we remember Beverly Cleary on what would have been her 105th birthday. She died just 18 days ago. Her legacy, bringing children books about regular kids, just like them.
